Highly accomplished senior mortgage leader with over 20 Years’ experience in residential mortgage banking, retail banking, across multi-branch environments. High volume mortgage call center management, Mortgage loan officer recruiting, Strong leadership, coaching and mentoring. Mortgage banking leader focused on strategically growing profitable market share for long term growth. A goal oriented and sense of urgency minded leader who is a true professional, service minded, courteous dedicated and accountable. Unwavering and seasoned team builder with strong core values and corporate posture, Servant leader with extensive contacts across the great state of Arizona. Trusted, reputable and accomplished in the Arizona marketplace and industry as a mortgage banking industry professional. Expert and advisory with a strong track record and excellent references."My Success, is a byproduct of helping others Succeed"
Area Mortgage Lending Manager Vice President

Mortgage Leader and retail banking professional with over 20 years experience in business to business and business to consumer mortgage sales and sales management. Retail and call center mortgage sales management experience. Knowledge of current mortgage processing and underwriting guidelines. Proven management and leadership skills using teamwork, communication, forecasting and planning, goal setting, and ethics. Experienced with employee development, sales training and performance measurements across multi-branch environments.
Chase Bank - Area Lending Manager  VP

Directly responsible for leading a team of mortgage bankers to grow retail mortgage production and generate profit in an assigned territory of 30+ bank branches in the south east valley and southern Arizona. Executes on strategic business plans to promote and market the firm’s mortgage products to clients and outside vendors; realtors; business leaders, etc. Develop and ensure successful execution of individual Mortgage Banker business plans.Develops partnership/working relationship with Bank Market and District Managers and increase partnership between mortgage sales team and Chase personal bankers, business banking bankers, and financial advisors. Participate in bank business reviews and process constant feedback from bank management.Partners with operations and underwriting teams to ensure great customer service, quality originations and overall efficiency. Establishes strong relationship with emerging markets and business development to leverage all mortgage opportunities in assigned geography.
Retail Banking Center   Branch Manager Vice President

Chase Retail Banking Branch Manager, coached and lead a team of 6 personal bankers to grow revenue through balance growth, managed  P&L with over $250 Million in assets, mentor trainer to new branch manager trainees, direct reports were an assistant branch manager sales and service represenative and 10 tellers.
